video.title: 72 Dangerous Animals: Australia
video.synopsis: Get an up-close look at Australia's deadliest creatures in this series that features interviews with wildlife experts and survivors of attacks.

episodes.synopsis: Venomous critters roam both land and sea in Australia. Under the ocean's surface is an entire world of swimmers inflicting pain and paralysis.
episodes.title: 72 Dangerous Animals: Australia: Season 1: Risky Waters

episodes.synopsis: Cameras capture creatures with a mean streak and lightning-quick reflexes, including a tiny grub with potent itch power and a giant water buffalo.
episodes.title: 72 Dangerous Animals: Australia: Season 1: Fast and Furious

episodes.synopsis: From city fliers and ocean swimmers to outback dwellers and even an extinct species, see how this group of beasts ranks on the danger scale.
episodes.title: 72 Dangerous Animals: Australia: Season 1: Dead or Alive

episodes.synopsis: Take an insider's look at Australia's most deadly and diminutive species, including a virus-carrying mosquito and the waterhole-dwelling olive python.
episodes.title: 72 Dangerous Animals: Australia: Season 1: Tiny Terrors

episodes.synopsis: Meet a wild canine with cute puppies and a bad reputation. Learn why the wild dingo may look cuddly, but is a deadly playmate.
episodes.title: 72 Dangerous Animals: Australia: Season 1: The Ancient Killer

episodes.synopsis: This episode reveals how a soothing dip in Australia's ocean can turn terrifying when the cold eyes and sharp teeth of a shark appear.
episodes.title: 72 Dangerous Animals: Australia: Season 1: The Greatest Fear

episodes.synopsis: This episode focuses on deadly creatures' playful ways, including the brutal sea lion, the poisonous stonefish and the furry fruit bat.
episodes.title: 72 Dangerous Animals: Australia: Season 1: Cruel Creatures

episodes.synopsis: This episode focuses on dangerous beasts and their natural weapons: Talons, teeth, fangs and tentacles are all instruments of pain and death.
episodes.title: 72 Dangerous Animals: Australia: Season 1: Instant Death

episodes.synopsis: Visit with one of Australia's most feared ocean dwellers: The stingray glides through the water, waiting to inflict pain with its barbed stinger.
episodes.title: 72 Dangerous Animals: Australia: Season 1: Seeing Red

episodes.synopsis: See how Australia's grasslands harbor animals worth worrying about, especially the venomous reptiles that slither among the country's green fields.
episodes.title: 72 Dangerous Animals: Australia: Season 1: Lurking in the Grass

episodes.synopsis: Which beast has the most vicious bite? It might be the jaws of an ancient creature, a rare reptile's fangs or poisonous spines caught on a fish hook.
episodes.title: 72 Dangerous Animals: Australia: Season 1: Brutal Bites

episodes.synopsis: This episode counts down Australia's top 10 deadliest animals, including the razor-jawed jack jumper ant and the beautiful killer box jellyfish.
episodes.title: 72 Dangerous Animals: Australia: Season 1: Unknown Dangers
